website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for use with beautyblender sponges, which most cleaning mats shred. Works with traditional brushes, too.
pros: Removes excess product, dirt, and oil from blenders and brushes
Textured, pink silicone pad helps penetrate sponge for deep cleaning action
Specifically designed to work with beautyblender, but works with other products, too
cons: Pricey, but doesn't destroy the sponge like other products

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy anything different to deep clean my brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I am a freelance makeup artist and this is how I clean all my brushes. I do not use anything else to deep clean my brushes or blenders. I will use cinema secrets in between my clients because it dries instantly. But you still need to deep clean your brushes at least once per week. I clean them after all clients. This is what I use. It works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I bought this before realizing thi is basically just. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before realizing thi is basically just.. soap. It has the same ingredients as any average bar of soap. Save yourself the money. That being said, it gets the job done (since it's literally just soap).
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Cuts brush cleaning time in half!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this product! I have so many brushes and sometimes I unfortunately let the dirty ones pile up and end up having to stand over the sink for long periods of time trying to get them all clean. I have tried many brush cleaners in the past but this by far the best for my brushes!! Makeup melts off the beauty blenders and brushes with ease! Will only be using this product going forward.
customer_reviews.author: MsJule

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but now I do happy I purchased this cleanser. It supposed to have a lavender fragrance, yet I don’t smell it which is fine. This little bar of soap truly gets my sponges clean unlike regular bar soap or even Purity by Philosophy which is what I was using to clean my sponges. The only negative I have found thus far is the price. It is pretty expensive no matter where you buy it from fir the size of the bar, but that doesn’t stop me from reordering since it truly dies a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: Myron D. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I bought a Beauty blender at Sephora, it came with a mini version of this and I was so obsessed. This soap is awesome, it cleans everything out of my beauty blender and leaves it looking brand new. It's honestly so easy, I clean my sponge with it every morning. It takes 2 seconds. I'd rather keep it clean than have all the gunk pile up- that's just not good for your skin. Also, I have sensitive skin and this does nothing to it. I prefer that it doesn't have a scent so this thing is perfect 👌 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Light scent, works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, a little goes a long way and it really does the trick. I use it for my beauty blender and my brushes. The little texture pad it comes with does wonders to really help with scrubbing out all the product. The scent is really light and pleasant too, and I had no irritation when using my brushes after. Just be careful not to press too hard when scrubbing your beauty blender because it will shred it.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Not chunking $$ down the drain anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I had my reservations about ordering, but it works beautifully, leaves the bb just clean as a whistle and smells nice and fresh to boot. If you use the sponges, get this--you'll be so happy not to toss them (or not satisfied with dirty sponges!)
customer_reviews.author: Tedra Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, quick clean.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about the "bar of soap" approach, since bars of soap often carry the most bacteria. So probably skeptical about how many uses I'll get out of this item. But, I will admit the stains lift quickly, even the stubborn ones. This product has a scent to it that if I were to define what clean smells like, it is this. I think this product is effective in the short term.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: GET. THIS. STUFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best product EVER!! I'm constantly cleaning my brushes and beauty blender and by far this has been the best and easiest. It smells wonderful, and gets so much crap out that I thought wasn't there. I have many expensive brushes that get caked with foundation, concealer, eyeshadow and now they are good as new. It comes with a pink pad in it that helps scrub makeup out and once you're done you place the soap ontop to dry. It dries fast. Then place back in the container with the pink pad on top so it doesn't stick to the lid :) PS: None of those photos are edited, the lightening in my bathroom is just poor at night!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans brushes really well
customer_reviews.text: This soap is so easy to use to clean my makeup brushes. One thing I did wrong was when I first opened it, I didn't realize the bright pink thing is like a soap dish holder so I immediately put the whole thing under the faucet to start using it. Fail. As far as the product goes, it is so very easy to just rub my brushes in the soap to get a nice lather. Great brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works really well! I'm able to clean my beauty blender with just a swipe of the soap usually. It got a little more difficult when the soap got really little. I wasn't super sure if how I was supposed to store the soap since it came in that little white container, but also had like a pink plastic flat dish. But it really does work well to take off foundations and concealers off my blender (even when I forget and wait until the next time I do my makeup to clean my blender - still cleans it very easily).
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Best product in a long time
customer_reviews.text: this works great, I received a sample from Sephora and fell In love. This quickly and effectively cleans all brushes and make up sponges without cause any damage or losing any brush bristles. It's in a handy little compact that you can keep in your make up bag, also great for traveling. I'm on here now sending one to my sister, she has to have this!
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Great but also bleaches/removes dye from beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: Cleans so well that it actually removes the dye from your beauty blender. The sponge is only a month old but looks slightly bleached. It’s definitely different from a regular bar of soap, not sure of the ingredients but it just cleans a lot better than normal brush/sponge cleaners
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean my brushes using tips online (mixing dish washing soap with extra Virgin olive oil which didn't work that well), but now it's so much easier to use this solid. Takes less time to clean and works so extremely well! My brushes look like new every time I wash them. It has a faint citrus scent, too. Love all beauty blender products!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Best soap ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner. I have mine for over a year and I still have some (don’t do makeup much) I love how fast it cleans. Their is also that satisfaction of seeing all the gunk out of the makeup on the beauty blender and brushes. I have gifted this and it’s a great present as well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Flores

customer_reviews.title: SOLID Makeup Applicator and Brush Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I used to use Dawn and olive oil to clean my brushes. I picked up the Beauty Blender Solid with my Beauty Blender. Now, I use it to clean all of my makeup applicators and brushes. Why is it so awesome??? - It's travel-friendly - It comes in an awesome container that drains any excess water - A little goes a long way - Formulated without parabens, sulfates, phthalates - Nice, light scent - REALLY cleans and gets the makeup off of my brushes It might be a little pricier compared to my Dawn and olive oil method but it's worth it! It cleans brushes better and faster!
customer_reviews.author: Love.and.Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great for brushes or sponges, and the scent is very light and nice. No residue and I wash my beauty blender after every use. It even works well to remove make up and staining if you forgot to wash it and you have to wash it before you use it next.
customer_reviews.author: Adempsey90

customer_reviews.title: No better than mild hand soap for removing makeup from brushes
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a product that quickly cleaned my brushes. This product did ultimately clean foundation and eye makeup from brushes, but no more easily than when I used a cake of mild hand soap.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A

customer_reviews.title: It does its job pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several products to clean my brushes but solid it’s by far the best soap cleaner ever! The scrubber plus the soap works amazing, love the smell and the price. Highly recommended ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Nicoletti

customer_reviews.title: am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I had just been using soap to clean all of my sponges, but I got an Amazon giftcard and thought "what the heck? I'll treat myself." Boy, am I glad I did! This stuff works wonders. I used it to clean one of my four month old Real Techniques sponges, and it worked so well that I can't even tell the difference between it and a brand new one. This stuff works way better than bar soap, plus, it does not irritate my super sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sunn Shine

customer_reviews.title: couldn't open soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Solid blender cleaner and not sure if the dispenser is defective but I could not open it at all. When I shook to hear if the soap was in there it didn't even make a sound. Im pretty sure I received an empty dispenser. Very unhappy, will be returning this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Elkind

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: This product is great at cleaning the Beauty Blender sponge but I prefer to use it to clean my regular makeup brushes. It is gentle on the hair but gets all of my brushes very clean. It keeps the hairs soft and conditioned while also getting out the darkest products. I think it is a little pricey you don't get a ton of product but overall gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie NelsonTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to let everyone know you’re not supposed to use the pink tool with your beauty sponge. The pink tool is meant to assist with cleaning your brushes. Love this product. Has a great smell. I prefer this over the liquid soap. Must have. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cleaning the beauty blender and brushes!
customer_reviews.text: This cleans my beauty blender like no other soap or cleanser has! I just run water into my beauty blender and rub it on the solid cleanser and I can see all the foundation coming out of it. It doesn't come out as clean as new since I use long-lasting waterproof liquid foundations, but it gets out all that's possible! It also works great for cleaning my other makeup brushes. So happy with this and I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, thought I could swirl my brushes on it with a little water. However, it’s a cake of soap that isn’t affixed to the case, so it moves around. Soap isn’t that great, either. Kinda just meh product.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Lasts longer than the liquid
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using the liquid blender cleanser. I was going through it so quickly and it is not cheap. I stumbled upon this and had to try it. I use it on my brushed and my beauty blenders. It works very well and lasts a lot longer than the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this solid cleanser! I've been using the one from Juno&co. It was nice but had a bad smell. I really enjoy the scent and it really gets my brushes and sponges clean!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my makeup brushes very well, it is also very easy to clean. There is really no scent to it which I enjoy. I have had mine for two years because you don’t need much of it to clean your brushes.Definitely will buy again once I am out.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to clean my brushes
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to clean my brushes, from foundation to blush to eye makeup brushes. Was easy to rinse out of the brushes, and left them smelling clean, but not fragranced. A couple of the brushes were pretty grungy, so it took a couple of washes, but overall, I would definitely buy this again! It seems expensive, but it doesn't take much to get the job done, and I anticipate this container lasting a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works well
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and works well. I have found that regular bar soap works well and is cheaper. So although this works well I am.using regular bar soap now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holland

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using this product to clean my beauty blender and my brushes. It could have just been the product I received but mine was a little difficult to open at first. Overall, great product and I love the lavender scent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Bradetich

customer_reviews.title: Best product for brush cleaning on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best beauty blender or stubborn dirty brush cleaner on the market. God knows what’s in it for chemicals but boy it does the job. It is THE only thing that gets foundation out of a beauty blender and foundation stains out of a duo fiber brush. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect for sponges
customer_reviews.text: I have a liquid cleanser as well, which is perfect for sponges, but I like this best for brushes. I hate spending what seems like forever cleaning all my brushes and this product works great and gets the job done quickly,
customer_reviews.author: Christina Martin

customer_reviews.title: THIS! Just what I have been looking for to get my beauty blender and make up brushes clean!
customer_reviews.text: This solid cleanser is SO easy to use and it gets my beauty blender and make up brushes SO SO SO clean! I have used other cleansers for my beauty blender and make up brushes and they don't even compare. I can see a major difference and I have only used this cleanser TWICE. My brushes look brand new again! So clean. I'm in love. If you hate cleaning your brushes, but want to get the job done properly (like myself) then this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used to wash my brushes with antibacterial soap and/or baby shampoo. Although these cleaned them well, some of my brushes became brittle and dry. I have noticed that my brushes get cleaner faster without drying them out when using this blendercleanser. I feel my brushes should last longer by using this product. Very easy to use. Remember to drain out any water left in the container and allow the blendercleanser to dry before closing it. This will help the blendercleanser last longer =)
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: While this is easy to use, moving forward I will probably just buy brush soap. Be careful not to rip the sponge!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: No scent. Works perfectly. Easy to travel with. Had allergic reaction around eyes from liquid version of this product but not the dry product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anne Prezio

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: The solid bar lasts a long time and I really adore it! Cleans my beauty blender well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Baller
customer_reviews.text: I'm infatuated with this brush cleaner! Such a beautiful job returning a makeup filled brush to pure white again! Will buy over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than anything I've used before to clean my makeup sponge and brushes! Hopefully it'll last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Breebee22

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect addition to your beauty blender. It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that actually cleans my beauty blenders. It's a bit spendy bit when there are no competitive products on the market that actually work, the price point is often irrelevant. Love my beauty blender and the cleanser is the perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: Crista McRae

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!!
customer_reviews.text: The rave reviews are true! I've been over wetting and scrubbing my brushes for ages trying to get them clean. I've dreaded trying to clean them as it was so much work before! Not any more! It is like a magic wand for your brushes. Seriously, a couple gos and your brushes are brand new! Shampoo never worked that well for me. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: Works well - overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I love using this to clean my brushes. It has worked the most consistently for me. However, I do think this is overpriced for what it is, but with the beauty blender name it is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Genna Mainardi

customer_reviews.title: Quickly cleans beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: Kind of fumbled around with this cleanser at first but it works better then anything else I had tried previously. Being a solid, versus liquid, it lasts much longer. Cleaned my beauty blender better then other products and rinses out easily. I am now using it to clean all of my brushes. Much easier for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: but nothing cleans the brushes/ blenders like this product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to clean not only the Beauty Blender but other makeup brushes as well! I have tried home soaps prior to buying this because I didn't want to send the money, but nothing cleans the brushes/ blenders like this product. The solid soap is easier to manage and not waste versus the liquid soap!
customer_reviews.author: MDR1188

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Cleaned both my beauty blender and brushes. The best product I have used so far. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lain1108

customer_reviews.title: Pink
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a short time but so far it works well with getting the blender clean
customer_reviews.author: JillSalsa

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd time buying this!
customer_reviews.text: This works WONDERS! I love using this to clean my sponges
customer_reviews.author: jennny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this solid. Makes cleaning sponges a very easy task.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrookeb

customer_reviews.title: Best way to clean your beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: Best way to clean your beauty blender. Far Superior to the gel cleanser. Get the BB so clean. Love it
customer_reviews.author: BigMama224

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Never found anything easier to use for make up brushes
customer_reviews.author: Irish3

customer_reviews.title: I like this solid cleanser a lot more than I do ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this solid cleanser a lot more than I do the liquid version. It acts a lot faster and it is more effective at removing stains out of my Beauty Blender. Also, I love how portable it is as opposed to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My acne has cleared up because I wash my make up brushes once a week with this cleaner. It cleans my brushes so well. I don't need to worry about bacteria spreading in my brushes because I know they are getting clean with this. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TD3639

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive what was pictured. The picture shows the original beauty blender cleaning bar. I got a lavender variation.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy way to clean your makeup brushes. Easy to use and rinses out quickly! Brushes felt very soft after being cleaned. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mercuri

customer_reviews.title: I heard great things, but like a bar of Cetaphil or ...
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things, but like a bar of Cetaphil or just plain baby shampoo way better. Especially for the price. It works, just not as well as much cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner I have ever used for beauty blenders! It even got makeup out when I thought they were clean! I have already bought another one as a backup, that's how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JgoffTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Gets make up completely out of your sponges. Love this stuff. It’s magic
customer_reviews.author: Joni Baraniak

customer_reviews.title: the rubber "brush cleaner" isn't very helpful, it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: the rubber "brush cleaner" isn't very helpful, it doesn't have enough little nubs to do anything, but I bought this for the soap anyways. I use it with a little rubber "egg" brush cleaner I got.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Real technique sponge
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my real technique sponge and honestly it's alot better than using regular soap
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Best way to clean brushes
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay better than other spray cleaners I’ve tried for my sponges & brushes. Seems less wasteful, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Epps

customer_reviews.title: Buy this !
customer_reviews.text: This product works beautifully to clean your beauty blender. I wish I hadn't waited so long to buy it. I'd been using baby soap, but it never fully got back to the original blender color. It looks (and feels) brand new every time. Will buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else works
customer_reviews.text: I was initially hesitant to buy this because of its price tag, but I'm glad I did. I tried everything to clean my beauty sponges: liquid soap, dishwasher soap, you name it. This is the only product that was able to clean and remove stains from my brushes and beauty sponges that were not in the best shape anymore. I will not be buying any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: If you don't already own this, I highly suggest you buy it. It's great for any type of brush or sponge. Very easy to use and works great. I cleaned over 10 brushes and sponges with it in only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: kjh2417

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product :)
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I am blown away after using it on my sponges and brushes. This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Oldfarmchick

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup tool cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. The liquid beauty blender cleanser smells funny, but this one doesn't. I use it for all of my brushes as well. I'm glad they included the little rubber mat for texture too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Opheim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The only product that actually cleans my brushes and sponges. Leaves everything perfectly clean and doesn’t strip away softness like other soaps might do. It’s so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling but...
customer_reviews.text: Works and convenient when traveling. However it is not as easy to use as the liquid cleaner. It requires greater effort to get an effective lather.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! Cleaning my makeup brushes is a breeze with this item. Just swish your brush in the wax then rub the brush on the palm of your hand under running water and watch the makeup rinse away. It takes me less than 5 mins to do all 15 of my brushes. I recommend this item for any makeup lover.
customer_reviews.author: leebabes

customer_reviews.title: Best Beauty Sponge Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleanser for my beauty blender. You can literally see all the makeup wash off. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jung

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as everyone makes it seem..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews. I don't thing it is as great as everyone makes it out to be. I used it for my beauty blender and it did not remove all of the foundation. I wash my blender after every single use! I used for a few bushes too and it dried them out. Aslo it strips the dye off the blender. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dijuva1

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing brush cleaner ever! I received a sample of this and was determined to buy it. It leaves your brushes and sponge looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for cleaning your makeup brushes! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It definitely is worth the price and has lasted months. It definitely cleans your blenders awesome while also the best brush cleaner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for Makeup Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup cleaner EVER! Design makes cleaning process super easy and way quicker than more traditional cleaning methods
customer_reviews.author: A&A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use less mess
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to brush cleaner. Easy to use less mess, less waste and smells amazing! Very gentle doesn’t irritate at all!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Very effective makeup sponge cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product does the job very well. Deep cleans the beauty blender makeup sponges, and makes them fresh and good as new. Highly recommend this product (and no one paid me to write this review).
customer_reviews.author: TeeWa

customer_reviews.title: better than the liquid version
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, better than the liquid version. I also like the fact that it's easy for me to travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tongtong

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: My makeup brushes have never been this clean before! I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: helloh

customer_reviews.title: but really does an amazing job cleaning my brushes
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey, but really does an amazing job cleaning my brushes. They are like new after I'm done cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Berly0422

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing! A little goes a long way. It deep cleans your make-up sponge quickly. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.B

customer_reviews.title: It makes washing my brushes fun and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money! And I use this for ALL my brushes! It makes washing my brushes fun and it works like a charm. And of course, works perfectly for the BeautyBlender and leaves no leftover makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches Jang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Washes my little makeup thing great. But I imagine any other kind of soap would do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Summer G.

customer_reviews.title: Product was recommended to me by a beauty consultant
customer_reviews.text: Product was recommended to me by a beauty consultant. However, the price from ShopXperts was slightly cheaper. Beauty Blender does a excellent job cleaning our cosmetic brushes.
customer_reviews.author: lab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My girlfriend loves how clean it got everything. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brush cleaner I've ever used! It cleans make-up brushes better than a liquid spray cleaner. It is also very convenient for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing brush cleaner! I thought I was gett my beauty blender and brushes clean before I got this cleanser. It's amazing! Gets rid of all makeup on brushes and beauty blender. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It cleans the brushed and sponge so fast that I want to do it all the time. I don't think I will ever use anything else for cleaning brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo C.

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this product as it gave my brushes a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it from BePretty and was really impressed by the fast shipping! I really enjoyed this product as it gave my brushes a great deep cleaning. I live in a rural area of Canada and the closest place to buy this would be 2 hours away. The price including shipping was only a few dollars more expensive than the closest Sephora (a two hour drive). That being said I wish the product last longer for the price I paid, but it's just a good makeup brush cleaner I immediately ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my beauty blender only.. I use other soap products to clean my brushes.. This is expensive so again only use it for BB and It works very nicely and really cleans the BB.. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabailey564

customer_reviews.title: Soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap cleans my brushes very well like its brand new again and it doesn't damage my Brussels ! I will be buying more of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny87

customer_reviews.title: Love it, well, except for the smell.
customer_reviews.text: First, let's start with the bad thing: This smells like my grandmother did. It might bring up some fond memories or something, but I didn't like it. Now, the good stuff: The smell is absolutely tolerable, especially considering how well this cleans my makeup brushes and the BeautyBlender sponge, and how fast. It's really amazing. They should have this come with the kit, not the liquid one. It's much better. You just roll it around in it, wash it, squeeze — clean. Completely clean. Like magic! Stinky, grandmother-smelling magic!
customer_reviews.author: Em G

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best cleanser EVER for my brushes and sponges also takes out any type of odor that brushes can sometimes carry love it !!!! Not the price though it's expensive ....which is why I only gave it 4 stars ....
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Cleans my beauty blender and my brushes like a dream, leaving them nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brush cleaner works very well. It's a bit pricey for such a small amount though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Can't use anything else. This is my 4th repeat ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't use anything else. This is my 4th repeat order. I use it daily to clean my beauty blender and I use it to wash my makeup brushes
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my brushes and it gets EVERYTHING out my brushes look brand new each time. Best cleaner I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Bocsardi

customer_reviews.title: best cleanser ever
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't leave a review because it already had so many positive ones but it's too good not to. I usually use Dr. Bronner's liquid soap which works like a charm. I didn't imagine anything would work as well but this actually works better. The make up washes out of my brushes so quickly and the soap rinses out of the hair easily. It has a very light, fresh, lavender scent. I'll never use another cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hyslop

customer_reviews.title: I read that you can clean just as well with ...
customer_reviews.text: I read that you can clean just as well with mild soap and warm water, but this cleanser to clean faster/easier. I don't know why it is so, but I think it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: MellowY

customer_reviews.title: It makes it so easy to clean your brushes and beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: I've been using soap to glean my brushes and beauty blender.... This is a game changer. It makes it so easy to clean your brushes and beauty blender. Will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Samuels

product_meta.title: beautyblender blendercleanser lavender solid for Cleaning Makeup Sponges & Brushes, 1 oz
feature_bullets: CLEANSER: BEAUTYBLENDER BLENDERCLEANSER Solid is the perfect pair for your makeup sponges and brushes. This cleanser removes excess product, dirt, and oil from blenders and brushes for a clean makeup application.
SCENTED: Infused with lavender, coconut and sustainable palm oils, this cleanser conditions the exclusive BEAUTYBLENDER foam while removing buildup and smelling good.

FORMULA: The BLENDERCLEANSER Solid professional-grade formula protects against 99.7% of harmful germs-even for up to 24 hours after cleansing your makeup sponge or brush.This cleanser is vegan and cruelty free and is also paraben, phthalate and sulfate free.

DIRECTIONS: Equipped with a textured, pink silicone pad to gently bounce your BEAUTYBLENDER Solid makeup sponge or swirl your brushes against the bumps to help the cleanser penetrate for deep cleaning.
SIZE: BLENDERCLEANSER Lavender Solid is the perfect size. This cleanser can fit perfectly inside your purse or travel bag so you never have to go without a clean brush or sponge.
